expo.name: Lb1_Lars_Gerencser
expo.description: This application is an easy to use Reflection greator and organiser. You can Add a Reflexion with the following Attributes Titel, Images, Voice Recordings and a Date

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera for capturing photos.
plugins.microphonePermission: The app accesses your microphone for recording audio.
